text: I realized last night that I can t trust myself I went into the city last night to walk around  Nothing more  I was drunk  I found a bridge  I climbed to the top and leaned over  Hundreds of feet below me was cold concrete  The wind was perfect  the temperature outside was perfect  Cars honking in the distance in the city  I could see stars in the sky  the buildings lit up in rainbows for pride week  I climbed over the railing  grabbed it and leaned even further  I couldn t even see the bridge anymore  I felt like Rose from Titanic  It felt like I was flying  I let one hand go  and I remember the wind blowing my hair in my face  I felt really free  I felt like I was in a movie  A cop passed me and kept driving  I spit and watched it fall so far until it was too small for my eyes to see  I don t think I ve ever been closer to death And I don t know why I climbed back to safety  I could ve died  I don t know why I chose not to  and I don t know if I m happy or sad with my choice  I could be feeling nothing right now  I could be free
summary: Last night I was drunk and I went to the city to walk around. I climbed a bridge and leaned over the edge. The wind was blowing my hair in my face and I felt like I was in a movie. I spit and watched the concrete fall until it was too small to see.
cleaned: night drunk go city walk climb bridge lean edge wind blow hair face feel like movie spit watch concrete fall small
